text:
Instagram content

Amal and George Clooney have a busy few weeks ahead of them, as they will become parents to twins sometime next month. Though June will be all about the next generation of Clooneys, May belongs to their dad, who turned 56 on Saturday. Thanks to Amal’s surprise birthday-party-planning skills, there was plenty of fanfare—Casamigos Tequila cake included—to go along with her husband’s birthday.

When he arrived at the couple’s London home on Saturday, George received a bit of a shock, per E! News. He was greeted by Rande Gerber atop his lawnmower—while Cindy Crawford trimmed fresh flowers in a nearby garden. They were joined by a group of close friends all there to surprise George.

E! reports that the whole thing was set up by a crafty Amal, who was careful not to miss any birthdays at the party. Gerber, who turned 55 on April 27, got to share in the celebration with his business partner. The cake, which followed the theme of Casamigos Tequila (George’s company with Gerber) featured George and Rande cake-toppers. ”Happy Birthday Amigos,” it read.

All important productions in the Clooney household seem to fall safely in the hands of Amal—as indicated by Matt Damon’s March interview with Entertainment Tonight about the couple’s soon-to-be-born twins:
title: Amal Clooney Threw George a Surprise Birthday Party—and There’s a Photo
